scripts.say: I received a sudden invitation from my secretary...

options.content: Yeah, Clevebro, I sure as hell do!

scripts.say: Commander, you wanna join my team for a basketball game?
Stop calling me Clevebro already! ... Also, I'm not asking if you wanna play, I'm asking if you wanna be our coach!
Why, you may wonder? Hehe, you see, Akashi suggested it as a way to bolster relations between the Eagle Union and Sakura Empire. Although, we somehow ended up picking a competitive sport for it.
The format's 3x3... Basically, each team consists of 4 players against another team of 4! And since we'll be playing, I thought I'd ask you to be our coach!
There's a prize involved, of course! The winner receives — and get this — a money tree!
Well, it's not really a tree, it's a plant, but that means I can make a bonsai out of it! That's two birds with one stone! Anyway, please, Commander! Be our coach!
I knew that money doesn't actually grow on the plant she was referring to, despite its nickname... But I decided not to mention that and went along with becoming their coach.
... You'll do it? Sweet! I knew I could count on you!
Oh, right, we still have work to do! A lot of it, too. C'mon, let's get a move on!
I'll gather all the team members once we're done! Heheh, I haven't been this fired up in ages!
Sorry, getting sidetracked! For now, let's focus on this paperwork! Here, please stamp this thing.
Putting a pin in the basketball conversation for later, Cleveland got right back to work. It's just like her to be reliable like that.
But still, why did they choose a basketball tournament out of all things...?
